name: Drift Simulator: Regera
description:
Drift simulation gameplay mode allows you to test your crazy drifting skills on various city tracks. With each car drift drive, you will get bonus points. You may have to complete drifting challenges in this gameplay version. Sneak through the edges by doing resilient car drift driving as a car driver and cut short of the edgy roads by using drift mode. Drifting is very helpful if you do not want to lose speed of your Regera during a high energy racing competition. It not only help you maintain speed on sharp turns but also help overtake opponent racer. Enjoy the Drifting Passion with Expensive Cars like Regera in City & Desert.

Features!

- Free driving mode and racing mode
- 3D Maps for car navigation
- High quality drifting physics
- Smooth controls
- Rear Camera view
- Advanced 4 wheel drive
- Modern racing dynamics
- Racing fights in deadly drift mania
- Surprise crashes with obstacles and hurdles
